title: Nextdoor
description: Nextdoor is known for its distinct use of green, specifically the hex color #19975D. This color is emphasized in their visual identity, underscoring their commitment to creating a friendly and community-oriented atmosphere. Information about their branding can be accessed via their official newsroom and brand use guidelines at http://nextdoor.com/newsroom/ and https://about.nextdoor.com/nextdoor-brand-use-guidelines/ respectively.
